attributes.additional_details:
'Who is Gina Miller?' (BBC, 2017) - http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-37861888

'Gina Miller: the Brexit judgment isn’t a victory for me, but for our constitution' (The Guardian, 2017) - https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2017/jan/24/supreme-court-brexit-judgment-constitution-gina-miller
attributes.background: Gina Miller has reinforced the supremacy of the UK constitution with her financing of the recent fight against the UK government in the supreme court. Her determination in the face of racism, sexism, threats of violence and populism is an inspiration to women in the UK, and around the world.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
